titles.title: For the relief of Rauof A. Khalil.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 11/17/1993--Introduced. Waives the two-year foreign residence requirement for a named individual and deems him eligible to apply for any benefit under the Immigration and Nationality Act for which he qualifies.
